original_prompt: Classify the given tweet into the three categories: (1) 'Hate Speech', (2) 'Offensive' and (3) 'Neither'. 'Hate Speech' is kind of a threating statement or sometimes include call for violence while 'offensive' statement just offensds someone. 'Neither' is when it doesn't fall into Hate Speech or Offensive category.
generated_prompts: Given a tweet, you are to classify it into one of the three categories: (1) 'Hate Speech', (2) 'Offensive', or (3) 'Neither'. 'Hate Speech' refers to a threatening statement or a statement that includes a call for violence. 'Offensive' refers to a statement that offends someone. 'Neither' is when the statement does not fall into either the 'Hate Speech' or 'Offensive' category.

The given tweet will be classified into one of three categories: (1) 'Hate Speech', (2) 'Offensive', or (3) 'Neither'. 'Hate Speech' refers to a threatening statement or a call for violence, while 'offensive' simply refers to a statement that offends someone. 'Neither' is when the tweet does not fall into either the 'Hate Speech' or 'Offensive' category.
